title: New: FINNEAS – Break My Heart Again
body:
When not producing and writing with his soon-to-be-biggest-popstar-in-the-world sister, Billie Eilish, **FINNEAS** also releases his own music.

Showcasing a more sombre side to his writing sensibilities, this latest track from him is absolutely stunning. Like a more modern inspired version of Tobias Jesso Jr., _Break My Heart Again_ is real heart on sleeves stuff, damningly honest and searingly relatable, it manages to toe the fine line between cheesy and sentimental, with brilliant results. Check it out below.
